port.h File Reference

Abstract the I/O ports for AT91 ARM7 microcontroller. More...

#include "config.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Defines

#define PORT_ARM7
#define PORT_A   AT91C_BASE_PIOA
#define PORT_BITS_MASK(first, last)   ((1 << ((last) + 1)) - (1 << (first)))
#define port_read(port)   (port)->PIO_PDSR
#define port_get(port)   (port)->PIO_ODSR
#define port_write(port, value)
#define port_pins_config_output(port, pins)   do {(port)->PIO_PER = (pins); (port)->PIO_OER = (pins);} while (0)
#define port_pins_config_input(port, pins)
#define port_pins_config_pullup(port, pins)
#define port_pins_config_peripheral(port, pins)   (port)->PIO_PDR = (pins)
#define port_pins_set_high(port, pins)   (port)->PIO_SODR = (pins)
#define port_pins_set_low(port, pins)   (port)->PIO_CODR = (pins)
#define port_pins_set(port, pins, state)
#define port_pins_toggle(port, pins)
#define port_pins_read(port, pins)   (port_read (port) & (pins))
#define port_pins_get(port, pins)   (port_get (port) & (pins))
#define port_pins_write(port, pins, value)
#define port_pin_config_output(port, pin)   port_pins_config_output (port, BIT (pin))
#define port_pin_config_input(port, pin)   port_pins_config_input (port, BIT (pin))
#define port_pin_config_pullup(port, pin)   port_pins_config_pullup (port, BIT (pin))
#define port_pin_config_peripheral(port, pin)   port_pins_config_peripheral (port, BIT (pin))
#define port_pin_set_high(port, pin)   port_pins_set_high (port, BIT (pin))
#define port_pin_set_low(port, pin)   port_pins_set_low (port, BIT (pin))
#define port_pin_toggle(port, pin)   port_pins_toggle (port, BIT (pin))
#define port_pin_get(port, pin)   (port_pins_get (port, BIT (pin)) != 0)
#define port_pin_read(port, pin)   (port_pins_read (port, BIT (pin)) != 0)
#define port_pin_write(port, pin, state)
#define port_bus_config_output(port, pin1, pin2)   port_pins_config_output (port, PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2))
#define port_bus_config_input(port, pin1, pin2)   port_pins_config_input (port, PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2))
#define port_bus_config_pullup(port, pin)   port_pins_config_pullup (port, PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2))
#define port_bus_write(port, pin1, pin2, value)
#define port_bus_read(port, pin1, pin2)   ((port_read (port) & PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2) >> (pin1))
#define port_init(port)   AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_PCER = BIT (AT91C_ID_PIOA)
#define port_shutdown(port)   AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_PCDR = BIT (AT91C_ID_PIOA)

Typedefs

typedef AT91S_PIO * port_t
typedef uint32_t port_bit_t
typedef uint32_t port_data_t
typedef uint32_t port_mask_t

Detailed Description

Abstract the I/O ports for AT91 ARM7 microcontroller.

Author:
M. P. Hayes, UCECE
Date:
2 Jun 2007
Note:
Macros are used to avoid function call overhead and to allow compile-time constant folding.

Define Documentation

#define PORT_A   AT91C_BASE_PIOA

Define ports.

#define PORT_ARM7

#define PORT_BITS_MASK ( first,
last   )     ((1 << ((last) + 1)) - (1 << (first)))

#define port_bus_config_input ( port,
pin1,
pin2   )     port_pins_config_input (port, PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2))

Configure selected bus of port as input without pullup.

#define port_bus_config_output ( port,
pin1,
pin2   )     port_pins_config_output (port, PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2))

Configure selected bus of port as output.

#define port_bus_config_pullup ( port,
pin   )     port_pins_config_pullup (port, PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2))

Configure selected bus of port as input with pullup.

#define port_bus_read ( port,
pin1,
pin2   )     ((port_read (port) & PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2) >> (pin1))

Read value from selected bus of port.

#define port_bus_write ( port,
pin1,
pin2,
value   ) 

Value:

port_write ((port), (port_get (port) & ~PORT_BITS_MASK (pin1, pin2)) \
              | (((value) & PORT_BITS_MASK (0, pin2 - pin1)) << (pin1)))
Write value to selected bus of port.

#define port_get ( port   )     (port)->PIO_ODSR

Get output state for port.

#define port_init ( port   )     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_PCER = BIT (AT91C_ID_PIOA)

Enable the clock for the port.

#define port_pin_config_input ( port,
pin   )     port_pins_config_input (port, BIT (pin))

Configure selected pin of port as input without pullup.

#define port_pin_config_output ( port,
pin   )     port_pins_config_output (port, BIT (pin))

Configure selected pin of port as output.

#define port_pin_config_peripheral ( port,
pin   )     port_pins_config_peripheral (port, BIT (pin))

Configure selected pins of port for alternative use such as for an internal peripheral.

#define port_pin_config_pullup ( port,
pin   )     port_pins_config_pullup (port, BIT (pin))

Configure selected pin of port as input with pullup.

#define port_pin_get ( port,
pin   )     (port_pins_get (port, BIT (pin)) != 0)

Get output state for selected pin of port.

#define port_pin_read ( port,
pin   )     (port_pins_read (port, BIT (pin)) != 0)

Read input state from selected pin of port.

#define port_pin_set_high ( port,
pin   )     port_pins_set_high (port, BIT (pin))

Set selected pin of port high.

#define port_pin_set_low ( port,
pin   )     port_pins_set_low (port, BIT (pin))

Set selected pin of port low.

#define port_pin_toggle ( port,
pin   )     port_pins_toggle (port, BIT (pin))

Toggle selected pin of port.

#define port_pin_write ( port,
pin,
state   ) 

Value:

((state) ? port_pin_set_high ((port), BIT (pin)) \
           : port_pin_set_low ((port), BIT (pin))
Write state of selected pin of port. This is equivalent to port_pin_set.

#define port_pins_config_input ( port,
pins   ) 

Value:

do {(port)->PIO_ODR = (pins);               \
        (port)->PIO_PER = (pins);               \
        (port)->PIO_PPUDR = (pins);} while (0)
Configure selected pins of port as inputs without pullup.

#define port_pins_config_output ( port,
pins   )     do {(port)->PIO_PER = (pins); (port)->PIO_OER = (pins);} while (0)

Configure selected pins of port as outputs.

#define port_pins_config_peripheral ( port,
pins   )     (port)->PIO_PDR = (pins)

Configure selected pins of port for alternative use such as for an internal peripheral.

#define port_pins_config_pullup ( port,
pins   ) 

Value:

do {(port)->PIO_ODR = (pins);               \
        (port)->PIO_PER = (pins);               \
        (port)->PIO_PPUER = (pins); } while (0)
Configure selected pins of port as inputs with pullup.

#define port_pins_get ( port,
pins   )     (port_get (port) & (pins))

Get output state for selected pins of port.

#define port_pins_read ( port,
pins   )     (port_read (port) & (pins))

Read input state from selected pins of port.

#define port_pins_set ( port,
pins,
state   ) 

Value:

do {if (state)                              \
            port_pins_set_high (port, pins);    \
        else                                    \
            port_pins_set_low (port, pins);} while (0)
Set selected pins of port to desired state.

#define port_pins_set_high ( port,
pins   )     (port)->PIO_SODR = (pins)

Set selected pins of port high.

#define port_pins_set_low ( port,
pins   )     (port)->PIO_CODR = (pins)

Set selected pins of port low.

#define port_pins_toggle ( port,
pins   ) 

Value:

do {port_data_t _tmp = ~port_get (port); \
        port_pins_write (port, pins, _tmp);} while (0)
Toggle selected pins of port.

#define port_pins_write ( port,
pins,
value   ) 

Value:

do {(port)->PIO_SODR = (pins) & (value); \
        (port)->PIO_CODR = (pins) & ~(value);} while (0)
Write to selected pins of port.

#define port_read ( port   )     (port)->PIO_PDSR

Read input state from port.

#define port_shutdown ( port   )     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_PCDR = BIT (AT91C_ID_PIOA)

Disable the clock for the port.

#define port_write ( port,
value   ) 

Value:

do {(port)->PIO_SODR = (value); \
        (port)->PIO_CODR = ~(value);} while (0)
Write value to port.
